title: Neutralize Try Demo section styling to match muted government palette

requirements.summary: Remove green-heavy background/accent styling in the Try Demo section and replace with neutral government-style panel treatment while keeping all copy and the demo link unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/TryDemoSection.tsx`, the section wrapper background is updated so it reads neutral (no noticeable green tint), while remaining consistent with the Option A government style (flat panels, minimal color).

Any green-accent-heavy styling within the Try Demo section (e.g., prominent green icon accents) is reduced or replaced with neutral foreground/muted styling so the section no longer feels 'too green'.
All user-facing text in the Try Demo section remains unchanged.
The demo launch link remains exactly `https://nexusforgeai.base44.app/Chat` and continues to open in a new tab.
No new gradients, glows, or decorative AI-style effects are introduced in the Try Demo section.

file_operations.description: Adjust the Try Demo section’s Tailwind classes to eliminate any green-tinted/AI-styled treatment and align with the site’s muted graphite/off-white government aesthetic. Keep the existing shadcn-ui Button/Card/Alert structure (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing). Specifically: (1) update the section wrapper background to a neutral background/panel (no green tint), (2) reduce green accents by replacing the `text-success` Sparkles icon styling with a neutral/muted foreground, (3) convert the warning alert to a mostly-neutral panel treatment (e.g., neutral background/border with a restrained warning accent) without adding gradients/glows, and (4) keep all text and the demo link/attributes exactly as-is (URL, new tab, noopener noreferrer).
